channel.title: Games you're looking forward to!
channel.description:
Tell us which incoming games are you most excited about.
My list so far:
* Assassin's Creed 3 * The Last of Us * Borderlands 2 (I know it just came out but I'm not buying it right away for now) * Grand Theft Auto 5 * Resident Evil 6 * Dishonored * Aliens Colonial Marines * Hitman Absolution * Bioshock Infinite * Project Eternity * Beyond: Two Souls * Tomb Raider

item.title: Games you're looking forward to!
item.dc:creator: MDIGN
item.description:
Batman: Arkham State
Hopefully we can go to Metropolis in this one, because that train in Arkham City was such a tease.

Read full topic

item.title: Games you're looking forward to!
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
DS uses a cross-platform engine. Honestly the only reason the PC port is poor, is because they were both inexperienced with PC and were probably under a tight schedule.

Read full topic

item.title: Games you're looking forward to!
item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
I’m sure the only reason why they were able to port DS is because it wasn’t all that specialized for the PS3 in the first place.

Read full topic

item.title: Games you're looking forward to!
item.dc:creator: Kairouseki
item.description:
Well obviously if it were to come to PC they would recode it to run on PC. It would be difficult though (probably even more so than Dark Souls) just because I’m sure Naughty Dog is using every trick available on the PS3 harware to do what they’re doing.

Read full topic

item.title: Games you're looking forward to!
item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
Dadster:

The Last Of Us (hopefully for PC)

Don’t be fucking silly.

I’m pretty sure no PS3 exclusive game like that could actually run on a PC anyway. The hardware they’re coded for is a whole nother beast than the standardized PC components.

Read full topic

item.title: Games you're looking forward to!
item.dc:creator: ac3d
item.description:
HL3, and maybe Battlefield 4, but BF3 is still a fresh and new game imo, they should hold off on another entry for at least 3 or 4 years, and patch the shit out of this game in the mean time.

Read full topic

item.title: Games you're looking forward to!
item.dc:creator: Kairouseki
item.description:
Last of Us is sadly never coming to PC, just like the Uncharted games and Heavy Rain. I have a PS3 still though so I’ll be enjoying it when it’s released.

Read full topic

item.title: Games you're looking forward to!

Hah, keep dreaming.

item.title: Games you're looking forward to!
item.dc:creator: Dadster
item.description:
Half-Life 3 (you know it’s coming)
Doom 4
Thie4f (alright… I know… Thief 4)
Aliens: Colonial Marines
Far Cry 3
Amnesia: A Machine For Pigs
Metro: Last Light
GTA V
Watch Dogs
Dead Space 3
Crysis 3
Star Wars 1313
The Last Of Us (hopefully for PC)
Dishonored
Lost Planet 3
Resident Evil 6
Tomb Raider (provided Lara isn’t constantly screaming & crying out in pain as in the trailers)
And, of course, Black Mesa Complete

Read full topic

item.title: Games you're looking forward to!
item.dc:creator: Aiden_Pearce
item.description:
Maxey:

Tell us which incoming games are you most excited about.

My list so far:

  • Assassin’s Creed 3
  • The Last of Us
  • Borderlands 2 (I know it just came out but I’m not buying it right away for now)
  • Grand Theft Auto 5
  • Resident Evil 6
  • Dishonored
  • Aliens Colonial Marines
  • Hitman Absolution
  • Bioshock Infinite
  • Project Eternity
  • Beyond: Two Souls
  • Tomb Raider

You have a pretty good taste in games and I would only add Watch Dogs and Metro:Last Light to that list.

Read full topic

item.title: Games you're looking forward to!
item.dc:creator: TheBunnyKicker
item.description:
At this point i kind of dont even care if HL3 ever comes out. I’m pretty sure they’d figure out a way to ruin the entire franchise with the ending.

Im ready to see the remake of the Xen levels From the BM team though

item.title: Games you're looking forward to!
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
To be honest, this thread is only for games that are confirmed to exist and to be coming out relatively soon. Even if we all know HL3/EP3 is coming out sometime, Valve hasn’t confirmed anything about its existence.

Read full topic

item.title: Games you're looking forward to!
item.dc:creator: TheBunnyKicker
item.description:
im looking forward to HL3 as well but im not expecting to see it before i die.
I expect to see L4D3 way before HL3
besides that im anxious to play

RE6
XCOM (the one that isnt a first person shooter)
AC 3
and the Bauldur’s gate remakes

Im not gonna buy Dragon age 3 because mass effect 3 and dragon age 2 have made me lose all hope i had in Bioware making decent RPGs.

Read full topic
